channel.title: [Shard] Stair glitch [Shard]
channel.description: Hello, im new at shards revolution and im stuk at a glitch heres a picture of it. [IMG]http://i714.photobucket.com/albums/ww144/klimtak/problem.png[/img] Im searched everywhere im could please help. but if i relogg it gets normal.

item.title: [Shard] Stair glitch [Shard]
item.dc:creator: @FtwCScape FtwCScape
item.description:
@FtwCScape wrote:

ZioBotic:

change it so the object takes you to a different place actionhandler.java i think, and search for the coords on google that you want it to take you to, go to actionhandler and then search for the x coord it takes you to when your in the air and change it to the new coords (x and y)… ygm?

Ok thanks i gonna try

Read full topic
